sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.FillShareableDashboards</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>FillShareableDashboards</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FillShareableDashboards = Class.create();
FillShareableDashboards.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
 
	fillChoice:function() {
		
		if (gs.hasRole('admin'))
			return "sys_idISNOTEMPTY";
		else if (gs.hasRole('pa_admin') || gs.hasRole('pa_power_user')) {
			var gp = [];
			var gr = new GlideRecord('pa_dashboards');
			gr.query();
			while(gr.next()) {
				if (gr.owner === gs.getUserID() || gr.canWrite())
					gp.push(gr.getUniqueValue());
			}
			return "sys_idIN" + gp.toString();
		}
 
		return "owner=" + gs.getUserID();
	},
	type: 'FillShareableDashboards'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-07-25 12:19:05</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>92b7cf86873022001ac119fa84e3ec13</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FillShareableDashboards</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Responsive Dashboards" source="com.glideapp.dashboards">77d3cdc76da620100acb70b353433016</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_92b7cf86873022001ac119fa84e3ec13</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-07-25 13:24:56</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>581</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
